## For Task PRs

<!-- Delete this section if your PR doesn't add/modify tasks in src/tasks/ -->

**Task path**: `src/tasks/<network>/<task-name>`

**Tenderly simulation link**: <!-- paste your Tenderly link here -->

### Simulation Checklist

> These boxes must be checked before your PR can be merged.

- [ ] I have run a Tenderly simulation for this task
- [ ] I have reviewed and understand all state changes in the simulation
- [ ] All state changes match the expected behavior documented in `VALIDATION.md`
- [ ] I can explain every state diff to reviewers and signers

### Task Checklist

- [ ] `README.md` is complete with accurate task description
- [ ] `VALIDATION.md` documents expected state changes with correct domain/message hashes
- [ ] Task status is set appropriately
- [ ] All TODOs in generated files have been addressed
